com.example.myapplication.services

Class HillService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.myapplication.services.HillService

  • public class HillService
extends java.lang.Object
    The HillService class is responsible for receiving data from outside of the library. The input data can be filtered and should use Enumerators for fields names and so for some values like hills category and filter sorting.

      • getInstance

        public static HillService getInstance(android.content.Context context)
        Gets HillService class instance using singleton. Needs Context from the current application context.

      • getHills

        public void getHills(@NonNull
                     io.reactivex.Observer<Hill> observer,
                     java.util.Map<HillService.Filters,java.lang.Object> searchFilter)
              throws InvalidQueryException
        Method used to get all hills data and can assume the provider filters if they exist.
        Parameters:
        observer - Callback for this request.
        searchFilter - Contains all the suitable filters for the search.
        Throws:
        InvalidQueryException
